user_query: I want to get the latest information on the Binance USD cryptocurrency and the current forex information for the USD-EUR pair.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest cryptocurrency information for Binance USD, including name, image, price, change, change percent, value, general quote, high quote, 24-hour volume, 7-day change, and day range.
Fetch the current forex information for the USD-EUR pair.
